entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 37 - Episode Three
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 37 - Episode Three20141130
I'm quite surprised by Mary's behavior as person, but not from a
meta-perspective on the show. I feel like they are really
dragging out the Mr Green situation.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 38 - Episode Four
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 38 - Episode Four20141130
I thought that Lord Merton was very cute with Isobel. I'm quite
worried about Thomas, I wonder if he's doing crazy drugs or
something. It was very funny how they picked on Molesley. Miss
Bunting is so annoying.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 39 - Episode Five
entry.content:

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 36 - Episode Two
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 36 - Episode Two20141128
This was a fun establishing episode. I feel like we are the
height of the season and tons of horrible things are going to
start happening as a consequence of their choices in this
episode. Ouch.

entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 35 - Episode One20141123
This was a very fun episode and it was amazing how quickly we
became wrapped up in the drama in the show again. It was hard to
not watch a second episode.

entry.title: Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Bayonetta 2 (WiiU, 2014) (2)20141122
I haven't been playing this much because I'm so busy, but I
decided to do it again. I played a Tag Climax and was destroyed,
then did the first level to remember the controls, then did
another level and made progress. I missed a bunch of verses in the
level I played, so there must have been an optional thing I didn't
find, which is kind of annoying because the exploration segments
aren't especially fun.

Total time: 4:38
  • Video Games
  • Bayonetta 2
  • WiiU
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (2)
entry.content:
Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (2)20141122
I played this for quite a while and did all the Donkey Kong and
Donkey Kong Jr levels, plus a bunch from other games. I like the
structure of the game, but it takes a lot for me to like some of
these games, like the Kongs.

Total time: 1:05

entry.content:

entry.title: Movie: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug, directed by Peter Jackson (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug, directed by Peter Jackson (2014)20141118
I didn't pay enough attention to this because I was programming at
the same time and the plot was very complicated. I feel like I
remember the story of The Hobbit well but there was a lot going on
here that I don't remember at all. I had to read the Wikipedia page
to really understand the plot afterwards. It was intense the way
Biblo reacted to the One Ring. The fight along the river was
awesome too. I think my favorite part was when Bilbo was talking to
Smaug.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.content:
Book: Joseph Smith: Rough Stone Rolling, by Richard L. Bushman (2005)20141118

wish it kept going and told the story of the Pioneers.

entry.title: Movie: Video Game High School: Season 3, starring Josh Blaylock (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Video Game High School: Season 3, starring Josh Blaylock (2014)20141117
We watched the whole season in one sitting. It was awesome. This
show is so clever. I love the way they did so many different styles
and I liked the way the integrated so many common high school drama
tropes. It was very fun.
  • Movies
  • 2014
